home.title: Make.org, a public interest accelerator
home.description: Propose, vote, act: finding solutions together to the biggest challenges we’re facing today. Those that receive the most support will be put into action by Make.org and its partners.

form.Password must be at least 8 characters: Your password must contain at least 8 characters.
form.email_already_exist: This e-mail address is already registered.
form.api_error: Oops! We’re having difficulty loading this page. Please try again later.

common.hide_modal: Hide the content of the dialog modal

proposal_page.share_text: Support this proposal by sharing it:
proposal_page.footer_text: This proposal was submitted as part of the {{operation_name}} campaign

intro_card.title: Thousands of citizens are proposing solutions.
intro_card.description_1: Give your opinion on these solutions & propose your own.
intro_card.description_2: The best ones will determine the actions we take.

final_card.title:
Thank you for your participation,
you can now access the complete consultation.

sign_up_card.title: Receive the results of the consultation and be informed about upcoming actions
sign_up_card.next-cta: No thanks, I don't wish to be informed of the results

push_proposal_card.title: Do you have a solution you'd like to propose on this subject?
push_proposal_card.next-cta: Not yet, I want to keep voting

proposal_submit.title: Submit your proposals by filling in this form. Keep your proposal under 140 characters:
proposal_submit.description: Don't worry, we’ll fix any spelling mistakes.
proposal_submit.moderation_charter: To find out more about our moderation guidelines,
proposal_submit.success: Your proposal has been received. It will now be reviewed by our moderation team. You will receive an e-mail once it has been validated.

vote.intro_title: I want to vote on this proposal.
vote.label: {{count}} vote

unvote.title: By clicking on the button below, I’m withdrawing my vote on this proposal:

results.title: The votes of others on this proposal are as follows:
results.total_text: The total number of votes is:

display.neutral: Display the results for: “I cast a blank vote”

hide.neutral: Hide the results for: “I cast a blank vote”

qualification.title: By clicking on the buttons below, I wish to be more specific on my vote:

authentification.title: Sign up to validate your proposal
authentification.commitment: Make.org is committed to protecting your

login.title: I already have an account
login.email_connect: Sign in with my e-mail address
login.email_doesnot_exist: We can't find an account associated with this e-mail address.

register.title: Create an account
register.subtitle: Sign up using this form
register.cgu_text: By signing up, you are agreeing to our {{cgu_link}} and consent to receive e-mails (not too many!) from Make.org.

forgot_password.title: Reset my password
forgot_password.description: Please provide us with the e-mail address associated with your Make.org account to receive a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.success: Thank you. An e-mail has been sent to you that will allow you to update your password.

footer_sequence.see_more: Find out more on the subject:
footer_sequence.link: Find out more about this consultation

cookie_alert.text: By continuing to browse this site, you agree to our {{cgu_link}}, our {{policy_link}}, as well as to the use of cookies on our site in order to improve our service.

activate_account.success: Your account has been activated. You can now sign in
activate_account.bad_link: This link is no longer valid.

reset_password.title: Create a new password
reset_password.info: You may choose a new password.

success.title: Thanks! Your password has been updated.

failure.bad_link: This link is no longer valid.
failure.error_message: Your password could not be changed.

not_found.title: Error 404
not_found.description: We are sorry, the page you have requested no longer exists.

common.submit_success: Your request has been taken into account.

newsletter_update.title: manage my email
newsletter_update.optin_label: By clicking I hereby accept receiving informations about Make.org (your email will never be revealed to a third party)

sharing.title: Share this consultation
sharing.display_pannel: Display the content of the sharing pannel
sharing.hide_pannel: Hide the content of the sharing pannel

partners.intro_text: Thousands of citizens commit themselves by participating in the consultation.
partners.commitment_text: They support the consultation and the citizen action plan that will follow.
partners.init: This consultation has been initiated by :

banner.title: Vote on the latest proposals on this topic

register.title: At the end of the consultation, citizens and partners of the consultation will meet to elaborate an actions plan built from your proposals.
register.text: You want to stay inform of the actions phase launching or participate to the actions workshops ?

support.title: Support the actions
support.text: When the actions plan is launched, you can follow here the progress and achievement of the actions, support or take part in it  at any time.

plan.title: Our citizens' action plan
plan.text: Here, you will find soon the actions plan built from the consultation.
plan.list-bait: What is an action on Make.org ?
plan.list-intro: For us, an action must be :
plan.list-third-item: - with a strong impact, real and measurable.

partners.title: Our actions' partners
partners.text: At Make.org we believe in gathering all agents (citizens but also companies, organizations, institutions...) to bring about major change.
